welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Biblis, a charming town in Germany known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourselves in our culture, try our delicious cuisine, and make unforgettable memories during your stay. Enjoy your time in Biblis!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
